title: RR Demo
instructions: Run the code, hit the replay button and step through the execution.
starter:
with open("nums.txt") as f:
    nums = f.read().strip().split()
    nums = [int(n) for n in nums]
    for n in nums:
        stars = "*" * n
        print(stars)

files./main.py:
with open("nums.txt") as f:
    nums = f.read().strip().split()
    nums = [int(n) for n in nums]
    for n in nums:
        stars = "*" * n
        print(stars)
